sentences.english: The guide is a brother publication to Pregnant Pause, released earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 本書也是今年稍早出版的《暫停懷孕》的姊妹篇。

sentences.english: Early on you find an herb and you get to practice drawing its symbol.
sentences.chinese: 稍早你找一支藥草，而且你開始練習畫它的符號。

sentences.english: Earlier, the government ordered state-owned companies not to lay people off.
sentences.chinese: 政府稍早下令國有企業不得裁員。

sentences.english: Set the alarm earlier than you absolutely have to.
sentences.chinese: 把鬧鐘調得比你必須要起牀的時間稍早一點。

sentences.english: A subway system opened earlier this year serves the major venues.
sentences.chinese: 該市已在今年稍早開通了連接各主要場館的地鐵系統。

sentences.english: Beckham said earlier that he was looking forward to the session.
sentences.chinese: 貝克漢稍早時曾表示，他很期待這次集訓。

sentences.english: Earlier the film had missed out on two early Oscar opportunities as the 83rd Academy Awards began.
sentences.chinese: 稍早時候影片錯失了兩項第83屆奧斯卡金像獎。

sentences.english: Did you watch the news today Nicholas Tse was bailed out of jail earlier today.
sentences.chinese: 你有看今天的新聞嗎謝霆鋒今天稍早被保釋出獄了。

sentences.english: Let's move back for a moment to what we discussed earlier.
sentences.chinese: 我們先回到稍早所討論的內容一下。

sentences.english: Regulators earlier expressed concern that the bid had Chinese funding.
sentences.chinese: 稍早主管機關對投標資金來自中國表示關切。

definition: late last year/the end of last year
